timeeatermod:HoldYourBreath.NAME: Hold Your Breath
timeeatermod:HoldYourBreath.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Time Lock. NL Gain !B! Block.

timeeatermod:Hiccup.NAME: Hiccup
timeeatermod:Hiccup.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Time Lock. NL Deal !D! damage.

timeeatermod:WakeUpSlap.NAME: Wake-Up Slap
timeeatermod:WakeUpSlap.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the duration of Time Lock on the enemy by 1.

timeeatermod:EchoingGuard.NAME: Echoing Guard
timeeatermod:EchoingGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have Time Lock, gain !B! additional Block.

timeeatermod:EndlessMemory.NAME: Endless Memory
timeeatermod:EndlessMemory.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return this card to your hand. NL Cannot cost less than 1.

timeeatermod:TimeShock.NAME: Time Shock
timeeatermod:TimeShock.DESCRIPTION: Double the enemy's Time Locked damage.

timeeatermod:OneTimeRewind.NAME: One Time Rewind
timeeatermod:OneTimeRewind.DESCRIPTION: It's rewind time! Yaaaa. NL This is a debug card tbh.

timeeatermod:SpringForward.NAME: Spring Forward
timeeatermod:SpringForward.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Enter Forward Tempo.

timeeatermod:FallBack.NAME: Fall Back
timeeatermod:FallBack.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enter Rewind Tempo.

timeeatermod:Snooze.NAME: Snooze
timeeatermod:Snooze.DESCRIPTION: If you have Time Lock, extend it by 1. NL Otherwise, gain 2 Time Lock. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:TimeWard.NAME: Time Ward
timeeatermod:TimeWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain Time Ward. NL BUGGED AS SHIT NL DO NOT TAKE

timeeatermod:TimelineDivergence.NAME: Timeline Divergence
timeeatermod:TimelineDivergence.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M!. NL Shuffle your draw pile.

timeeatermod:BorrowedTime.NAME: Borrowed Time
timeeatermod:BorrowedTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL The next card you draw will be a *Void.
timeeatermod:BorrowedTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL The next card you draw will be a *Void.

timeeatermod:Desynchronize.NAME: Desynchronize
timeeatermod:Desynchronize.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Time Lock. Whenever your Time Lock wears off, gain 1 Time Lock.

timeeatermod:KnockOutPunch.NAME: Knock Out Punch
timeeatermod:KnockOutPunch.DESCRIPTION: Apply 2 Time Lock. NL Deal !D! damage.

timeeatermod:ReliveThePast.NAME: Relive The Past
timeeatermod:ReliveThePast.DESCRIPTION: If in Rewind Tempo: Draw 2 Cards. NL Otherwise, enter Rewind Tempo.

timeeatermod:GlimpseBeyond.NAME: Glimpse Beyond
timeeatermod:GlimpseBeyond.DESCRIPTION: If in Forward Tempo: Draw 2 Cards. NL Otherwise, enter Forward Tempo.

timeeatermod:TimeLockWeak.NAME: TimeLockWeak
timeeatermod:TimeLockWeak.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Time Lock, apply 2 Weak.

timeeatermod:TimeLockVulnerable.NAME: TimeLockVulnerable
timeeatermod:TimeLockVulnerable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the target has Time Lock, apply 2 Vulnerable.

timeeatermod:ButterflyEffect.NAME: Butterfly Effect
timeeatermod:ButterflyEffect.DESCRIPTION: Each time an enemy's Time Lock expires, it affects ALL enemies.

timeeatermod:RecurringRampage.NAME: Recurring Rampage
timeeatermod:RecurringRampage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When you draw this card, increase its damage by !M! for the rest of combat.

timeeatermod:RecurringStrike.NAME: Recurring Strike
timeeatermod:RecurringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Double this card's damage, increase its cost by 1, and return it to your hand.

timeeatermod:DaylightSavings.NAME: Daylight Savings
timeeatermod:DaylightSavings.DESCRIPTION: Energy is conserved for next turn.

timeeatermod:SpareTime.NAME: Spare Time
timeeatermod:SpareTime.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Whenever you draw this card, increase its [E] by 1 until played.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: . NL Whenever you draw this card, increase its [E] by 1 until played.

timeeatermod:SelectiveMemory.NAME: Selective Memory
timeeatermod:SelectiveMemory.DESCRIPTION: Choose 3 cards in your draw pile. Discard them.

timeeatermod:Ripple.NAME: Ripple
timeeatermod:Ripple.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable and !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

timeeatermod:Reverberate.NAME: Reverberate
timeeatermod:Reverberate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times.

timeeatermod:DiscardAllAttack.NAME: DiscardAllAttack
timeeatermod:DiscardAllAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Discard ALL copies of this card in your hand and deck.

timeeatermod:ChangeOfPace.NAME: Change of Pace
timeeatermod:ChangeOfPace.DESCRIPTION: You may choose to enter Forward or Rewind Tempo. NL Scry !M!.

timeeatermod:LeapPastFate.NAME: Leap Past Fate
timeeatermod:LeapPastFate.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your Time Lock. NL Negate your Time Lock.

timeeatermod:Blueshift.NAME: Blueshift
timeeatermod:Blueshift.DESCRIPTION: Take double damage this turn. NL Gain 1 Intangible next turn. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:Redshift.NAME: Redshift
timeeatermod:Redshift.DESCRIPTION: Deal double damage this turn. NL Next turn, ALL enemies gain 1 Intangible. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:AfterImage.NAME: After Image
timeeatermod:AfterImage.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 Block.

timeeatermod:FleetingStrength.NAME: Fleeting Strength
timeeatermod:FleetingStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Lose !M! Strength the next time you lose HP.

timeeatermod:FleetingDexterity.NAME: Fleeting Dexterity
timeeatermod:FleetingDexterity.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. Lose !M! Dexterity the next time you lose HP.

timeeatermod:ExhaustDraw.NAME: ExhaustDraw
timeeatermod:ExhaustDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card, then you may Exhaust 1 card.

timeeatermod:Recall.NAME: Recall
timeeatermod:Recall.DESCRIPTION: Put 1 card from your discard pile into your hand, then discard 1 card.

timeeatermod:EdgeOfTomorrow.NAME: Edge Of Tomorrow
timeeatermod:EdgeOfTomorrow.DESCRIPTION: Detonate the target enemy's Time Lock, then reapply the Time Lock that the enemy had before.

timeeatermod:Pivot.NAME: Pivot
timeeatermod:Pivot.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] the first time you change Tempo each turn.
timeeatermod:Pivot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Gain [E] the first time you change Tempo each turn.

timeeatermod:TemporaryPowerDemo.NAME: Auto-Generated Temporary Power
timeeatermod:TemporaryPowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Scry this turn, gain !M! Block.

timeeatermod:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
timeeatermod:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

timeeatermod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Card Parsing, Card Selection, Card Mods
timeeatermod:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.

timeeatermod:InlineCardModDemo.NAME: Inline Card Mods
timeeatermod:InlineCardModDemo.DESCRIPTION: Add a random Strike of any color to your hand. NL Enchant it with "Kills Spikers."

timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.NAME: Multiple Previews - One Card
timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.
timeeatermod:MultiPreviewDemoCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Add a random Upgraded *Stinky *Watcher *Buddy into your hand. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:TimeEaterXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
timeeatermod:TimeEaterXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Gain X Strength. NL Exhaust.
timeeatermod:TimeEaterXCostDemo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage X+1 times. NL Gain X+1 Strength. NL Exhaust.

timeeatermod:TimeEaterModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
timeeatermod:TimeEaterModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1: Draw !M! cards or gain !timeeatermod:si! Strength.
